targeting_mode.description: Determines which targeting mode is used.

autoplay_starting_effects.description: [bool]If disabled, the missile wont play the audio and trail FX.

time_to_enable_guidance.description: Time that it takes to enable guidance, 0 means will be enable from the start, -1 means that we should enable it manually.

time_to_disable_guidance.description: Time that it takes to disable guidance, 0 means will be disable from the start, -1 means that we should disable it manually.

distance_to_enable_guidance.description: Distance that it takes to enable guidance, 0 means will be enable from the start, -1 means that we should enable it manually.

distance_to_disable_guidance.description: Distance that it takes to disable guidance, 0 means will be disable from the start, -1 means that we should disable it manually.

movement_prediction_accuracy.description: [0,1] - How much the missile is predicting the point of impact depending on current target velocity (1 is best prediction)

time_to_enable_movement.description: Time that it takes to enable movement, 0 means will be enable from the start, -1 means that we should enable it manually.

time_to_enable_explosive.description: Time that it takes to enable explosive, 0 means will be enable from the start, -1 means that we should enable it manually.

max_lifetime.description: Time before the missile blows itself up. Set to 0 or lower to disable and have the missile live forever.

starting_speed.description: The speed at which the missile launches at.

minimum_speed.description: The minimum speed at which this missile can travel.

preferred_speed.description: The target speed at which this missile wants to travel.

max_angle_to_target.description: The missile will be at its slowest but turn the fastest at or above this angle to the target.

min_turn_speed.description: How fast this missile can turn while going at its preferred speed.

max_turn_speed.description: How fast this missile can turn while going at its slowest speed.

p_factor.description: How much of the difference in current and target speed to consider when changing speed.

i_factor.description: How much of the speed difference over time to consider.

d_factor.description: How much of the speed delta to consider.

target_update_interval.description: How often do we update our target?

missile_trail.description: Particle effect trail that gets attached to the missile.

missile_trail_audio_event.description: [wwise]What audio event to play when the missile is fired.

missile_trail_audio_event_stop.description: [wwise]What audio event to play when the missile has exploded.

target_dot_minimum.description: What's the minimum dot product between the current forward of this entity and its target position before we can update the position? -1 to disable.

javelin_firing_mode.description: [bool]When enabled, the missile that is fired will curve up and then down.

movement_should_be_processed_by_projecti.description: [bool]If set, the projectile system will handle collision/explosions/damages/vfx/sfx getting that data from the projectile setting.

projectile_type_to_process.description: The projectile type that it should process by the projectile manager, if it set to none it should be passed through the spawn context.
